title: As Ukraine Bears Down, Life Worsens in Occupied Areas
description: Those fleeing speak of the growing dangers of bombardment and of Russian forces commandeering homes and sheltering among civilians.
dc:creator: Carlotta Gall and Oleksandr Chubko

media:content.media:credit: Ivor Prickett for The New York Times
media:content.media:description: Civilians who fled the Russian-controlled village of Kachkarivka arriving at a Ukrainian registration point last week.
